ClassDesc: The Google Play com.android.vending.INSTALL_REFERRER @B_android#content#Intent_E@ is broadcast when an app is installed from the Google Play Store. This @B_android#content#BroadcastReceiver_E@ listens for that @B_android#content#Intent_E@, passing the install referrer data to GTM for Mobile Apps and Google Analytics.
